text: Mana Nyasaye wuwe Omulesi namuchamila obulayi ne namukhusia okhukhusia okhulayi, ne Zakaria naba omuliindi wuwe. Buli olwa Zakaria yenjilanga mushikoro shiaye yamunyoolanga nebiakhulia. Kho namureeba mbu; “Ewe Mariam bino orusiye hena?” Mariamu Naboola mbu; “Bino birula khu Nyasaye, toto Nyasaye akabilanga owayenya okhubura eshichelo.”
